biotools.summary: The Protein Sequence Motif Extractor reads a fasta file or tab delimited file containing protein sequences, then looks for the specified motif in each protein sequence. Results are stored in a new file containing the regions of the protein that contain the specified motif. The default output format is a new fasta file named _Motifs.fasta, but you can alternatively use /T to specify that a tab-delimited text file be created.
